languages.text:
Жертва умирает у моих ног. Тяжело опустившись над ней, я отрезаю кусочек ее плоти и с удовольствием проглатываю.
Славная охота. За нее Просительница заплатит мне еще раз. В конце концов Кикеросс — лишь ведьма, хоть и высокопоставленная, а я — Бичеватель. Мучительными изменениями плоти, кровавым паломничеством на самую вершину шпилей я заслужил свой особый статус. Ее вендетта с Тервантьясом, вылившаяся в убийство его новой игрушки, ниже моего внимания. Ведь я — Охотник Темного города.

The Prey dies at my feet. I lean over it heavily, cut off a lump of its flesh, and swallow it with pleasure.
It was a glorious hunt. The Petitioner will pay me for it again. Keykeross is just a Wych after all, albeit a high-ranking one, and I am a Scourge. I earned my special status by agonising changes to the flesh and a bloody pilgrimage to the top of the spires. Her vendetta against Tervantias, which led to the assassination of his latest plaything, is beneath me. For I am a Hunter of the Dark City.

Славная охота. За нее Просительница заплатит мне еще раз. В конце концов Кикеросс — лишь ведьма, хоть и высокопоставленная, а я — Бичеватель. traits.locale_text:
The Prey dies at my feet. I lean over it heavily, cut off a piece of its flesh and swallow it with pleasure.
It was a glorious hunt. The Petitioner will pay me for it again. Keykeross is just a Witch after all, even if a high-ranking one, and I am a Scourge. I earned my special status by agonizing changes to the flesh and a bloody pilgrimage to the top of the spires, and her vendetta with Tervantias that lead to the assassination of his latest plaything is beneath me. For I am a Hunter of the Dark City.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
獲物は私の足元で死んだ。私はその上に大きく身を乗り出し、肉の塊を切り落とし、喜びとともにそれを飲み込んだ。
見事な狩りだった。嘆願者はまた私に報酬を支払ってくれるだろう。キーケロスは高位とはいえ所詮はウィッチに過ぎない。私はスカージだ。肉体への苦悩に満ちた変化と、尖塔の頂上への血塗られた巡礼によって、特別な地位を得た者だ。彼の一番新しい道具を暗殺することに繋がった、彼女のテルヴァンティアスへの恨みは、私には理解できない。私は仄暗き都のハンターなのだから。
languages.original_text:
The Prey dies at my feet. I lean over it heavily, cut off a lump of its flesh, and swallow it with pleasure.
It was a glorious hunt. The Petitioner will pay me for it again. Keykeross is just a Wych after all, albeit a high-ranking one, and I am a Scourge. I earned my special status by agonising changes to the flesh and a bloody pilgrimage to the top of the spires. Her vendetta against Tervantias, which led to the assassination of his latest plaything, is beneath me. For I am a Hunter of the Dark City.

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
猎物死在了我的脚下。我沉重地靠在它身上，切下一块肉，愉快地吞了下去。
这是一场光荣的狩猎，委托人会额外给我加钱。尽管绮克萝丝地位很高，但她终究只是个巫灵。至于我，我可是天灾。我通过痛苦的肉体改造，以及尖塔塔顶的血腥朝圣，才赢得了我的特别地位。至于她和特万提亚斯之间究竟有什么恩怨，特万提亚斯的新玩物为什么会死，我并不关心，因为我是黑暗之城的猎人。
languages.original_text:
The Prey dies at my feet. I lean over it heavily, cut off a lump of its flesh, and swallow it with pleasure.
It was a glorious hunt. The Petitioner will pay me for it again. Keykeross is just a Wych after all, albeit a high-ranking one, and I am a Scourge. I earned my special status by agonising changes to the flesh and a bloody pilgrimage to the top of the spires. Her vendetta against Tervantias, which led to the assassination of his latest plaything, is beneath me. For I am a Hunter of the Dark City.

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
La presa muere a mis pies. Me inclino con pesadez sobre ella, corto un trozo de carne y me lo trago con placer.
Ha sido una caza gloriosa. La solicitante me pagará por ella de nuevo. Keykeross no es más que una bruja, aunque de alto rango, y yo soy un azote. Me gané mi estatus especial con agonizantes modificaciones a mi cuerpo y un peregrinaje sangriento a la cima de las agujas. Su ridículo rencor contra Tervantias, por más que haya propiciado la muerte de su último juguete, es indigno de mi atención. Soy un cazador de la Ciudad Siniestra.
languages.original_text:
The Prey dies at my feet. I lean over it heavily, cut off a lump of its flesh, and swallow it with pleasure.
It was a glorious hunt. The Petitioner will pay me for it again. Keykeross is just a Wych after all, albeit a high-ranking one, and I am a Scourge. traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
Die Beute stirbt zu meinen Füßen. Ich beuge mich schwer über sie, schneide ein Stück ihres Fleischs ab und schlucke es mit Vergnügen.
Es war eine glorreiche Jagd. Die Bittstellerin wird mich erneut dafür bezahlen. Keykeross ist schließlich nu reine Hekatari, wenn auch eine hochrangige, und ich bin eine Harpyie. Ich habe mir meinen besonderen Status verdient, durch qualvolle Veränderungen des Fleischs und eine blutige Pilgerreise an die Spitze der Türme. Ihre Fehde mit Tervantias, die zur Ermordung seines neuesten Spielzeugs geführt hat, ist unter meiner Würde. Denn ich bin ein Hunter der Dunklen Stadt.
languages.original_text:
The Prey dies at my feet. I lean over it heavily, cut off a lump of its flesh, and swallow it with pleasure.
It was a glorious hunt. The Petitioner will pay me for it again. Keykeross is just a Wych after all, albeit a high-ranking one, and I am a Scourge. I earned my special status by agonising changes to the flesh and a bloody pilgrimage to the top of the spires. Her vendetta against Tervantias, which led to the assassination of his latest plaything, is beneath me. For I am a Hunter of the Dark City.

traits.locale_text:

Es war eine glorreiche Jagd. Die Bittstellerin wird mich erneut dafür bezahlen. Keykeross ist schließlich nu reine Hekatari, wenn auch eine hochrangige, und ich bin eine Harpyie. Ich habe mir meinen besonderen Status verdient, durch qualvolle Veränderungen des Fleischs und eine blutige Pilgerreise an die Spitze der Türme. Ihre rachsüchtige Fehde mit Tervantias, die zur Ermordung seines neuesten Spielzugs geführt hat, ist unter meiner Würde. Denn ich bin ein Hunter der Dunklen Stadt.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
La proie se meurt à mes pieds. Je me penche sur son corps inerte et excise un morceau de sa chair dont je me délecte.
Quelle traque ! La requérante devra me payer une seconde fois. Après tout, quel que soit son rang, Keykeross n'est qu'une Céraste, et moi, je suis un Fléau. J'ai gagné ce titre en subissant les affres des altérations de la chair et le pèlerinage sanglant vers le sommet des tours. Sa petite vendetta qui m'a amené à assassiner le dernier jouet de Tervantias est indigne de moi. Car je suis un chasseur de la Cité Crépusculaire.
languages.original_text:

It was a glorious hunt. The Petitioner will pay me for it again. Keykeross is just a Wych after all, albeit a high-ranking one, and I am a Scourge. languages.text:
Avım, ayaklarımın dibinde ölüyor. Ona doğru eğiliyorum, bir et parçası kesip zevkle yutuyorum.
Şanlı bir av oldu. Müracaatçı yine ödeme yapacaktır. Her ne kadar yüksek rütbeli olsa da Keykeross, nihayetinde sadece bir Viç. Bense Musibet'im. Özel statümü, bedenime yapılan azap verici geliştirmelerle ve kulelerin tepesine yaptığım kanlı hac yolculuğuyla elde ettim. Tervantias'la olan ve onun son oyuncağının suikastına yol açan kan davası, benim için önemsiz bir mesele. Nihayetinde ben Kara Şehir'in Avcısı'yım.
languages.original_text:
The Prey dies at my feet. I lean over it heavily, cut off a lump of its flesh, and swallow it with pleasure.
It was a glorious hunt. The Petitioner will pay me for it again. Keykeross is just a Wych after all, albeit a high-ranking one, and I am a Scourge. I earned my special status by agonising changes to the flesh and a bloody pilgrimage to the top of the spires. Her vendetta against Tervantias, which led to the assassination of his latest plaything, is beneath me. For I am a Hunter of the Dark City.

traits.locale_text:
Av, ayaklarımın dibinde ölüyor. Ona doğru eğiliyorum, bir et parçası kesiyorum ve onu zevkle yutuyorum.
Şanlı bir avdı. Müracaatçı yine ödeme yapacaktır. Keykeross, her ne kadar yüksek rütbeli de olsa sadece bir Viç nihayetinde ve ben bir Musibet'im. Özel statümü, bedenime yapılan azap verici geliştirmelerle ve kulelerin tepesine yaptığım kanlı bir hac yolculuğuyla elde ettim. Tervantias'a karşı beslediği ve sonunda onun son oyuncağının suikastına yol açan kan davası, benim için önemsiz bir mesele. Nihayetinde ben Kara Şehir'in bir Avcı'sıyım.
traits.speaker: Player
